00016 #include <stdlib.h>
00017 #include <stdio.h>
00018 #include <inttypes.h>
00019 #include <stdint.h>
00020 #include <math.h>
00021 #include <limits.h>
00022 #include <errno.h>
00023 #include <unistd.h>
00024 #include <string.h>
00025 #include <stdarg.h>
00026 #include <yyast/node.h>
00027 #include <yyast/utils.h>
00028 #include <yyast/config.h>
00029 #include <yyast/count.h>
00030 
00031 ya_t YA_NODE_DEFAULT = {
00032     .type  = YA_NODE_TYPE_NULL,
00033     .position = {.line = UINT32_MAX, .column = UINT32_MAX, .file = UINT32_MAX},
00034     .size  = sizeof (ya_node_t),
00035     .node  = NULL
00036 };
00037 
00038 ya_t ya_generic_nodev(const char * restrict name, ya_type_t type, va_list ap)
00039 {
00040     va_list ap2;
00041     ya_t    *item;
00042     size_t  item_size   = 0;
00043     ya_t    self        = YA_NODE_DEFAULT;
00044     off_t   self_offset = 0;
00045 
00046     va_copy(ap2, ap);
00047 
00048     // Calculate the size and position of the content.
00049     self.type = type;
00050     for (item = va_arg(ap, ya_t *); item != NULL; item = va_arg(ap, ya_t *)) {
00051         if (self.position.file == UINT32_MAX && item->position.file != UINT32_MAX) {
00052             // The first node which has a file (not UINT32_MAX) is used for where self is located.
00053             self.position.file   = item->position.file;
00054             self.position.line   = item->position.line;
00055             self.position.column = item->position.column;
00056 
00057         } else if (self.position.file == item->position.file) {
00058             // The lowest line, column number combination is selected from nodes which are in the same file.
00059             if (item->position.line < self.position.line) {
00060                 self.position.line   = item->position.line;
00061                 self.position.column = item->position.column;
00062 
00063             } else if ((item->position.line == self.position.line) && (item->position.column < self.position.column)) {
00064                 self.position.column = item->position.column;
00065             }
00066         }
00067 
00068         switch (item->type) {
00069         case YA_NODE_TYPE_COUNT:
00070             fprintf(stderr, "Found YA_NODE_TYPE_COUNT token, which is only allowed for line counting\n");
00071             abort();
00072 
00073         case YA_NODE_TYPE_LIST:
00074             // A list node inserts the child nodes into self, therefor the header of the list node is not included.
00075             self.size+= item->size - sizeof (ya_node_t);
00076             break;
00077 
00078         default:
00079             // This is a normal node, it will be copied as a normal child into self.
00080             self.size+= item->size;
00081         }
00082     }
00083 
00084     // With the content header.
00085     self.node = calloc(1, self.size);
00086     self.node->name                 = htonll(ya_create_name(name));
00087     self.node->type                 = self.type;
00088     self.node->size                 = htonll(self.size);
00089     self.node->position.file     = htonl(self.position.file);
00090     self.node->position.line     = htonl(self.position.line);
00091     self.node->position.column   = htonl(self.position.column);
00092 
00093     // Add the content of the items to the new list.
00094     for (item = va_arg(ap2, ya_t *); item != NULL; item = va_arg(ap2, ya_t *)) {
00095         switch (item->type) {
00096         case YA_NODE_TYPE_COUNT:
00097             fprintf(stderr, "Found YA_NODE_TYPE_COUNT token, which is only allowed for line counting\n");
00098             abort();
00099 
00100         case YA_NODE_TYPE_LIST:
00101             // Only copy the contents of a list, without the header.
00102             item_size = item->size - sizeof (ya_node_t);
00103             memcpy(&(self.node->data[self_offset]), item->node->data, item_size);
00104             self_offset+= item_size;
00105             break;
00106 
00107         default:
00108             // Copy all of the node including the header.
00109             item_size = item->size;
00110             memcpy(&(self.node->data[self_offset]), item->node, item_size);
00111             self_offset+= item_size;
00112         }
00113 
00114         // Now that the child node is copied in self, we should free() it.
00115         free(item->node);
00116     }
00117 
00118     va_end(ap2);
00119 
00120     // Make sure the this node has a position, if not take it from the current position of the parser.
00121     if (self.position.file == UINT32_MAX) {
00122         self.position = ya_previous_position;
00123     }
00124 
00125     return self;
00126 }
00127 
00128 ya_t ya_generic_node(const char * restrict name, ya_type_t type, ...)
00129 {
00130     ya_t   r;
00131     va_list ap;
00132 
00133     va_start(ap, type);
00134     r = ya_generic_nodev(name, type, ap);
00135     va_end(ap);
00136 
00137     return r;
00138 }
00139 
00140 ya_t ya_branch(const char * restrict name, ...)
00141 {
00142     ya_t   r;
00143     va_list ap;
00144 
00145     va_start(ap, name);
00146     r = ya_generic_nodev(name, YA_NODE_TYPE_BRANCH, ap);
00147     va_end(ap);
00148 
00149     return r;
00150 }
00151 
00152 ya_t ya_list(const char * restrict name, ...)
00153 {
00154     ya_t   r;
00155     va_list ap;
00156 
00157     va_start(ap, name);
00158     r = ya_generic_nodev(name, YA_NODE_TYPE_LIST, ap);
00159     va_end(ap);
00160 
00161     return r;
00162 }
00163 
00164 void ya_node_save(FILE *output_file, ya_t *node)
00165 {
00166     fwrite(node->node, node->size, 1, output_file);
00167 }
